attributes.additional_details: I attend climate protests and while some may view this as an annoyance, I view the governments climate policy in a similar way. We should have a voice to stand up for what we believe in.
attributes.background: The Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill is attempting to make it an offence to cause serious annoyance or inconvenience. The police should not be allowed to criminalise any public protest. Please block this Bill in parliament.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not pass the Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579242

Do not restrict our rights to peaceful protest: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579012

Remove single person protest clauses in Police, Crime, Sentencing & Courts Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578875
